name: Utility Apps
description: A collection of utility apps, like a gpa calculator, weather app, etc.

name: Dynamic Events Calendar
description: A dynamic events calendar that allows users to add, edit, and delete events. Stores events in local storage.

name: Video Editor App
description: A video editor app that allows users to upload videos, trim them, add music and download the edited video.

name: Hotel Management System
description: A hotel management system that allows users to book rooms, view bookings, and manage rooms.
